summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a court order regarding the jury selection schedule for a case, likely related to the Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell proceedings, as reviewed by Judge Nathan.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The judge who reviewed the jury selection schedule with the parties during a conference.

events.title: Jury Selection Schedule Conference
events.description: Judge Nathan reviewed the schedule for jury selection with the parties during a conference.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 23, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
It transmits a court order regarding the jury selection schedule for a case.
Judge Nathan had reviewed the schedule with the parties during a conference that week.
The case is associated with the Southern District of New York.
The attachment is a PDF titled '2021.10.23_order rejury_selection_process.pdf'.
